entry.title: Road Trip
entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,151Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 49

Summary: "Just get a ride home with Derek." First of all, how dare his dad! Because Stiles had reminded his dad‚Äîmultiple times‚Äîto book the damn flight before prices went up, but Sheriff Stilinski forgot, and now Stiles is trapped in Derek Hale‚Äôs self-modified, apocalypse-ready Toyota FJ Cruiser for a twelve-hour drive home in a snowstorm with nothing but mutual hatred and unresolved teenage grudges for company. What starts as a petty road trip filled with aggressive silence, judgmental snack commentary, territorial road navigation, and one deeply inconvenient bathroom emergency slowly tightens into something unbearably tense, something electric. It's the kind of disaster that feels inevitable, the kind where you know things are going to go wrong. And oh‚Äîthey go very, very wrong.

entry.title: I'll Make A Man Out Of You
entry.summary:
Author: Nightowl_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,733Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 11

Summary: Stiles was a pussy. Derek hated to say it; he loved him, but he was a gigantic frail, emotional pussy. It was almost like his kid got switched at the hospital at birth. When Derek was growing up, he had always been the athletic, daring, aggressive, confident, muscular kid that oozed sexual energy. Stiles was the complete opposite, with maybe the exception that he was still somewhat athletic. He was timid, sensitive, lacked confidence, and he let his friends and teammates step all over him. There was no other way to say it; he was a giant pussy. Derek was so goddamn sick of watching him slink around the house like a beaten dog, coming home with red eyes, whining and crying to his mom about what this asshole or that bitch said to him. Derek had tried everything to toughen him up‚Äîextra workouts, tough love talks, pushing him harder at practice‚Äîbut nothing stuck. Then came the day Stiles burst through the door sobbing to both him and Claudia about catching his girlfriend cheating, and Derek finally snapped. Enough was enough.

Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 406,495Chapters: 36/40Kudos: 1,023

A butterfly flapping it‚Äôs wings on one side of the world, creates a hurricane on the other.‚Äù He nodded, that‚Äôs exactly how this situation sounds right now. If he and Scott never went out that fateful night and looked for that body, or if he and Derek never became friends, or hell, if he never agreed to Deatons plan in the first place‚Ä¶ then none of this would be happening. entry.title: Two Minutes
entry.summary:
Author: SashaDoeDeer

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,031Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 15

Summary: ‚ÄúThis is sheriff Noah John Stilinski of the Beacon Hills Sheriff‚Äôs Office. The date is February twenty second, twenty fourteen. The hour is six thirty-two AM. This is the questioning of Derek Hale, age twenty-six, regarding the events of Mieczyslaw ‚ÄúStiles‚Äù Stilinski‚Äôs kidnapping. Under California Penal Code section two-zero-nine, this case qualifies for both asportation and aggravated kidnapping. Life without parole is a guaranteed charge if a confession or incriminating speech to use in prosecution is recorded." Derek listens to every word. He's been in trouble with the law before and it's never really bothered him before, but this is new territory. He can't get locked up because then Stiles won't have someone to scent him, or clean his wounds, or protect him against the doctors from the institute who are certainly looking for them. Christ, Stiles must be so defenseless right now. Derek has to clear this up here and now; it doesn't matter how much he‚Äôll have to apologize to Stiles for saying every vulnerable, dehumanizing little thing they went through to his father.

entry.summary:
Author: whiry

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 108,434Chapters: 18/21Kudos: 201

Summary: Born into a world of the supernatural and forced to segregate himself and his human peers from the supernatural creatures that inhabit Beacon Hills, Stiles grew up with the belief that integration was the key to a better life, thanks to his mother‚Äôs social work. Of course, that belief is only furthered by the mate mark he bears of his mate‚Äôs first words to him, something only supernatural creatures and their occasional human mates are supposed to have. Desperate to find his mate and carry on his mother‚Äôs work after her death, Stiles does everything in his power to unite his town, even if that means enduring dinners with Derek Hale, who hates him and refuses to speak to him. After a terse interaction, Derek finally speaks and the two realize they‚Äôre mates. Well, surely Stiles can still get his happy ending. Right?
